name: LibertyFlamesSportsNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get the latest in news from the Liberty University Flames delivered to your Flash Briefing. Bringing you the latest in over the 20 NCAA sports available, this skill will help you catch the latest breaking news from Liberty University athletics.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
